stimulusHtml: The price elasticity of demand for a product is 0.5. If the price of the product increases by 20 percent, which of the following will occur?
choicesHtml: The quantity demanded of the good will increase by 10%.
The quantity demanded of the good will increase by 20%.
The quantity demanded of the good will increase by 40%.
The quantity demanded of the good will decrease by 10%.
The quantity demanded of the good will decrease by 40%.
